content.html:
I generally like Zane Lowe. He sometimes comes across as a modern day John Peel.

BUT

Boy, on occasions he can sound like a pretentious SOB.

Am I being unfair?
content.value:
I generally like Zane Lowe. He sometimes comes across as a modern day John Peel.
BUT

Am I being unfair?

content.html:
The British parliament is a lot better at cross the aisle zingers than what you hear in the USA … and when they do … it’s often an insult delivered in the nicest possible way …take this one from yesterday.

“The first time I’d heard a corpse deliver its own eulogy”

content.html:
Here’s an idea - and to be clear #justmytwocents - but if you are going to use the word ‘Ramble’ in your blog title, please don’t be too literal. You can on occasions

  • be coherent
  • not whine
  • say something original
content.value:

not whine
say something original

content.html:
🎶🎵 NME on Blink-182’s New Single

I really like Edging … BUT .. I take issue with the label ‘progressive’.

Yes - I think they have progressed from some of their earlier work - but no - it is not ‘Progressive’ .. am I getting pedantic in my old age?
content.value:
🎶🎵 NME on Blink-182’s New Single
I really like Edging … BUT .. I take issue with the label ‘progressive’.
Yes - I think they have progressed from some of their earlier work - but no - it is not ‘Progressive’ .. am I getting pedantic in my old age?

content.html:
I just read something about a ‘Marketing Startup’ … my brain understood ‘Marketing Standup’.

I think my brain was correct.

content.html:
Maybe because I have recently been watching some below average / average movies recently - that this one stands out. On another day. I might rate it at 3 1/2 stars - but leaving at 4 for now.

Here’s the question … coincidence … or action from the grave?

content.html: It's a documentary - so move on if you don’t like them. Personally - big as the issue was - I totally missed the story when it was in the news. BUT very good. I would like to have seen more delving into the Libyan connections - rather than a ‘simple’ fraud - maybe there will be a part two?
